title: Luma AI â€” AI Tool Review
description: Luma AI's Dream Machine generates high-quality, realistic videos from text and images, known for fluid motion and consistent physics. Luma AI is an AI research company offering Dream Machine, a video generation model known for producing physically realistic, smoothly animated videos. It excels at character motion, camera movement, and scene consistency. Luma also offers NeRF-based 3D capture using a phone camera. Dream Machine is accessible via web and API with competitive pricing. Highlights: Excellent motion fluidity. Strong physics simulation. Image-to-video support. Accessible pricing. API available.
